alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:31PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gulf, southwestern Wakulla, southeastern Liberty and Franklin Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Carrabelle, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Sopchoppy, East Camp, Buck Siding, Morgan Place, Saint Teresa, Mcintyre, High Bluff, Yent Place, Sanborn, Beverly, Owens Bridge, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Lanark Village, Creels, Curtis Mill, Hays Place and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
